repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
Documentation note before the front folio by V Raghavan. The note mentions 22 pages 9 lines, Bhaṭṭabhāskara’s commentary on kāṇḍa Yajurveda VII.IV.22 to VII. V . 12 and below this name is written- V Raghavan. Manuscript begins in the middle the commentary on anuvāka 20. Before the manuscript begins one folio with explaining something related to jyotiṣṭoma is seen. It seems some commentary although needs attention to check if it is part of some anuvāka from the 7th kāṇḍa of Yajurveda or not. This content does not resemble with the commentary on anuvāka 18 or 19 from the VII.IV.
x1 tyādigataṃ kān ? sotu parāṇāmurdhīri? gatasamāptaparetya ṛṣisāmānyavivakṣa(se?) … x9 namurthānaṃ jyotiṣṭoma ityādi prāyaṇīyasyedaṃ lakṣaṇañcaturthaviṃśa ityādiprāyaṇiyānantaraāraṃbhaṇīyam caturviṃśa uktasya ityarthaḥ prathanta eveti prathanta
It seems that the part of the manuscript is missing as the manuscript begins with folio 62.

msItem.title: Yajurvedabhāṣya ( Bhaṭṭabhāskara commentary)
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭabhāskara
msItem.incipit: 62v 1 asatyasmin jñāpakāya peśaḥ rūpaṃ rūpavṛndaṃ he maryāḥ manuṣyāḥ chandasi niṣṭarkya ityatra nipātyate apeśase asatyasmin rūpahitāya nañsubhyāmityuttarapadāntodā 62v 2 ttatvaṃ ..

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil Letter numerals in the left margin of the verso.

additions.desc: On 62v hariḥ oṃ is written in the lower left margin.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya saṃhitā of kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra Vols 12, kāṇḍa 7.4–7.5 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskrit no. 18 Mysore Government Branch press 1898 .(Vols are available on archive org.)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
